meanings.sent1: The inceptor of the project had great ideas.
meanings.sent2: The team leader was the inceptor of the new strategy.
meanings.sent3: The inceptor of the surprise party was very sneaky.
meanings.sent4: She was the inceptor of change in the organization.

meanings.definition: A device or substance that initiates a process.
meanings.sent1: The inceptor of the alarm system was a small sensor.
meanings.sent2: The key card acted as the inceptor for the security system.
meanings.sent3: The inceptor for the experiment malfunctioned, causing chaos.
meanings.sent4: The inceptor for the growth of plants was sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The inceptor for the machine's operation was the power button.

meanings.sent1: She will inceptor the new project next week.
meanings.sent2: The teacher inceptored the lesson with an interesting story.
meanings.sent3: He inceptored the game by surprising everyone with a new rule.

meanings.sent5: The chef inceptored a unique dish that became a hit.
